phrs.translation: 中点, 中点坐标公式
乌节中豪坊, 乌节中心坊, 難
中点列表, 所有行星
相位中点表格, 计算各个星体

sentences.sentence: Because the midpoint of the Medieval Warm Period was about 850, an extension of Bond's cycles would place the midpoint of the next warm interval in the twenty-fourth century.
sentences.translation: 由于中世纪温暖期的中点约为850年，因此邦德循环的延长将使下一个温暖间隔的中点出现在二十四世纪。

sentences.sentence: She has not yet reached the midpoint of her life.
sentences.translation: 她尚未达到人生历程的一半。

sentences.sentence: Executive producer spills about episodes, "In the fall finale we reset the series again, something that we've done at the midpoint of most of our seasons."
sentences.translation: 执行制作人对于剧情这样描述：“秋季档大结局中，我们又重新整合了剧情，几乎每一季的中间档都是这么做的。”
